title: Can't purchase RP
body:
Hey Riot, so i've been trying to purchase RP for the last two days too open some more chests and i keep getting this error message.
"You have exceeded the maximum amount of  attempts at this time. Please wait 24 hours and try again.
After waiting the 24+ Hours and trying again still the same message. I have scoured through the forums and have found many other posts like this one with no solution from any Riot staff.
Please help.

-Yes i have money in my account.
-Yes i have entered all of my details correctly.
-Yes i have tried via other payment methods. (PayPal & Prepaid cards) Still the same message.

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'll have to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) about this as this is an account-specific inquiry and we on the boards are unable to help with account issues.
